org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.widgets
Class MTSceneTexture

                      org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.shapes.MTRectangle
                          org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.widgets.MTSceneTexture
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.mt4j.components.css.util.CSSStylableComponent, org.mt4j.components.interfaces.IMTComponent, org.mt4j.components.interfaces.IMTComponent3D, org.mt4j.input.IMTInputEventListener, org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.componentProcessors.lassoProcessor.ILassoable, org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.IGestureEventListener
public class MTSceneTexture
extends org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.shapes.MTRectangle

The Class MTSceneTexture. This class allows to display a scene from within another scene. The scene will be displayed as a textured rectangle. This is only supported using the OpenGL renderer and a graphics card supporting the frame buffer object extension.

Author:
Christopher Ruff
